hero.subtitle: Innovative PVC and ALU solutions for the future of construction
hero.title: PVC and ALU profiles and systems
hero.description: Abi uses the latest technology for the production and processing of aluminum profiles. Our products are tailored to your specific needs, from idea to realization, providing excellent solutions for modern architecture and industry worldwide.

opening.title: Opening of new residential-commercial building
opening.description: ABI COMERC proudly announces the opening of a modern residential-commercial building in the heart of the city. The project combines excellent design, functionality and quality, offering apartments of various structures and modern business spaces adapted to the needs of today's market. On a special page you can explore building details, view floor plans, 3D animations and available apartments.

about.title: About Us
about.description: ABI COMERC d.o.o. Bužim is a family company specialized in the production and sale of PVC and ALU joinery. We provide complete solutions - from design and production to professional installation. With more than 15 years of experience, we build quality reputation and long-term relationships with clients and partners. Among other things, we also deal with the sale of construction materials.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide advanced aluminum and PVC systems that guarantee durability, energy efficiency and aesthetic value. We focus on innovation, quality workmanship and fast and reliable service.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We sell and produce durable and tested profiles.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
efficiency.description: Solutions that save heating and cooling.

installation.title: Professional Installation
installation.description: Fast and precise installation by our team.

projects.title: New Projects and Investments
projects.description: We work on multiple projects simultaneously - from residential buildings to business facilities. The project page for the new building will contain detailed floor plans, 3D animations, gallery and list of available apartments.

cta.text: Want a quote or visit? Contact us.

building.title: Our New Business Building
building.description: Welcome to the page dedicated to the opening of our new building. This investment represents a step forward in the development of our company, enabling better working conditions and improving the production of PVC and ALU joinery.
building.details: The new building is equipped with modern equipment and modern premises so that we can provide even better quality services to our partners and clients. More information about the grand opening coming soon!
